extends Object

                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<alien4cloud.dao.model.GetMultipleDataResult<ApplicationEnvironmentDTO>> search(@PathVariable

                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<List<alien4cloud.model.application.ApplicationEnvironment>> getEnvironmentCandidatesToCopyInputs(@PathVariable

        applicationId - application's id
        getInputCandidatesRequest - contain parameters for input candidate requests
        Returns:
        list of candidates to copy from

                produces="application/json")

        @RequestMapping(value="/{applicationEnvironmentId:.+}/status",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<alien4cloud.paas.model.DeploymentStatus> getApplicationEnvironmentStatus(@PathVariable

        Get the current status of the environment for the given application.
        Parameters:
        applicationId - the id of the application to be deployed.
        applicationEnvironmentId - the environment for which to get the status
        Returns:
        A RestResponse that contains the application's current DeploymentStatus.

        Exception

                consumes="application/json",

 @ResponseStatus(value=CREATED)
 @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
